title: Chicken fricassée
description: Use a whole jointed chicken to give maximum flavour in this comforting classic. Best served on creamy mash.
ingredients: 1.5kg/3lb 5oz whole chicken, cut into 8 pieces, plus the rest of the carcass
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1kg/2lb 4oz floury potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
salt and freshly ground black pepper
